column1: Séguéla is a town in western Ivory Coast. It is the seat of both the Woroba District and the Worodougou Region. It is also a commune and the seat of and a sub-prefecture of Séguéla Department.
Séguéla is served by Séguéla Airport.

column2: the population of the sub-prefecture of Séguéla was 63
